title: Monospaced dot matrix font on Dodge Music Center ticket (Dave Matthews Band concert)
content:
i'm trying to figure out what font this is

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141226010921im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_4235.jpg)
author: danfitz36

comments.content:
Probably proprietary to the ticket printer.

- Lex
there's gotta at least be something similar though, any ideas?

[ITC Machine](http://web.archive.org/web/20141226010921/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/itc-machine/)?

Edit: A couple more to look at: [Screener](http://web.archive.org/web/20141226010921/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/screener/), [Arame](http://web.archive.org/web/20141226010921/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dimitrelima/0arame/).
thanks, i think those are close enough.
